item.title: Oscar-winning actor Gene Hackman and his wife and dog found dead in their New Mexico home
item.description: Authorities say Oscar-winning actor Gene Hackman, his wife and their dog were found dead in their New Mexico home.

item.title: Andrew Tate, who faces rape and trafficking charges in Romania, has left for the US
